CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__DeliveryMethod__c, "Delivery") , IF( Address__c = "", "Delivery Address: " & Account__r.ShippingStreet & ", " & Account__r.ShippingCity & ", " & text( Account__r.ShippingStateCode) & " " & Account__r.ShippingPostalCode, "Delivery Address: " & Address__r.Street__c & ", " & Address__r.City__c & ", " & TEXT(Address__r.StateProvinceCode__c) & " " & Address__r.ZipPostalCode__c), "Customer Pickup at Branch")
CustomField.label: RBO Delivery/Pickup Address
